title: Jonas Vingegaard Loses Key Wingman for Tour de France Showdown with Tadej Pogačar
content:
Visma-Lease a Bike’s curse of injury and illness continues as all-terrain French ace Laporte ruled out with ongoing, long-term sickness.

Read the full article at Jonas Vingegaard Loses Key Wingman for Tour de France Showdown with Tadej Pogačar on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
